name: First Samurai
overview: Can You Hack It As A Samurai? You'll need more than a slashing sword to penetrate the heart of this evil adventure. You'll need wisdom, to ring the magic bells that summon the wizard mage. You'll need skill and power, to scale the insurmountable walls and leap over pools of fire, and you'll need all the courage you can muster to defeat your ultimate demon. So sharpen your wits and take a stab. You'll find it's a mile-a-minute mystery just figuring out how to survive!
